mapper.sql: USER_SEQ, OPENID, UNIONID, USERNAME, PASSWORD, ROLE_NO, ROLE, STATUS, USER_TYPE, REALNAME, COMPANY, COMPANY_TYPE, MOBILE_NO, EMAIL, SEX, BIRTHDAY, WECHAT, PROVINCE_CODE, CITY_CODE, DISTRICT_CODE, ADDRESS, QUESTION, ANSWER, IMAGE_PHOTO, OPTION01, OPTION02, OPTION03, OPTION04, OPTION05, CREATETIME, UPDATETIME
mapper.select: SELECT ID, NAME, CODE, REMARK, date_format(CREATETIME, '%Y-%m-%d') AS CREATETIME, date_format(UPDATETIME, '%Y-%m-%d') AS UPDATETIME FROM SYS_ROLE T1 WHERE T1.ID IN ( SELECT ROLE_ID FROM SYS_USER_ROLE WHERE USER_SEQ = #{userSeq} )
SELECT * FROM SYS_MENU T WHERE T.ID IN ( SELECT DISTINCT T2.MENU_ID FROM SYS_USER_ROLE T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS_ROLE_MENU T2 ON T1.ROLE_ID = T2.ROLE_ID WHERE T1.USER_SEQ = #{userSeq} )
